sentences.cn: “比赛结果怎样？”——“利兹队以1比0获胜。”

sentences.en: Don't just win the match; overwhelm your opponents by about 20 goals to nil.
sentences.cn: 不只是要赢这场比赛, 而且要以大约20∶0的比分压倒对方.

sentences.en: My knowledge of the subject is practically nil.
sentences.cn: 我在这方面的知识几乎等于零.

sentences.en: Our team won the game three nil / three goals to nil, ie 3 - 0.
Our team won the game three nil.
Profits zoomed from nil in 1981 to about 16 million last year.
sentences.cn: 利润从1981年的零收益飙升至去年的1,600万。

sentences.en: Scotland beat England one-nil at Wembley.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰队在温布利球场以1比0击败了英格兰队。

sentences.en: The energy requirement for hydrolytic reactions is considered nil.
sentences.cn: 水解反应所需的能量被认为是零.

sentences.en: The heating in winter was almost nil.
sentences.cn: 冬季供暖设施几乎毫无用处。

sentences.en: The new machine reduced labour costs to almost nil.
sentences.cn: 新机器把劳动成本几乎降到零。

sentences.en: The rank outsiders, Cameroon, beat the defending champions, Argentina, by one goal to nil.
sentences.cn: 本不被看好的喀麦隆队却以1比0击败了卫冕冠军阿根廷队。

sentences.en: The result of the game was 3 - 0 [ three - nil or three - nothing ] .
sentences.cn: 比赛结果是三比 零.

sentences.en: Theoretically sludge yield is nil for the extended aeration process.
sentences.cn: 对延时曝气法而言,理论上污泥生成量应为零.

sentences.en: They beat Argentina one-nil in the final.
sentences.cn: 他们在决赛中以1比0击败了阿根廷队。

sentences.en: They gave an insipid opening performance in a nil-nil draw with Peru.
sentences.cn: 他们与秘鲁队的揭幕战打得波澜不惊，最终以0：0战平。

sentences.en: We can win the rubber 2 games to nil or 2 - 1.
sentences.cn: 我们可以以2比零或2比1赢得这叁局两胜的比赛.
